title: Dealing with Teemo (super short)
body:
When **teemo** is around, you better have a ward with you and be extra careful.

If he disappears: Look in the bushes nearby, and if he isn't there...he obviously used his special ability thing..so just place a ward somewhere.

Mushrooms: When you're chasing teemo, you should be aware for the mushrooms, it causes penta kills..no joke.

Lol I was lazy writing this. I'll do one more when I got the energy...

replies.body: Don't chase a Teemo. That's really what you should've said. He will kite you, blind you, and poison you. Stay behind your minion wave and let them eat the mushrooms. Letting him dictate the fight means you aren't using your best tool to fight him: your lack of interest. When he does make the mistake of showing up in range of you, focus him down and destroy him. Until then, ignore him.
